title: Charlotte McKinney flaunts her cleavage and toned abs in a tiny black crop top
text:
She shot to stardom after appearing in the 2017 remake of Baywatch.

And Charlotte McKinney showcased her sensational physique as she headed to the PrettyLittleThing X Kelly Gale with Paris Hilton at the Sunset Towers in Los Angeles.

The actress, 26, put her ample assets on display in a tiny black bralet with a plunging neckline, which also highlighted her toned washboard abs.

Glam: Charlotte McKinney showcased her sensational physique as she headed to the PrettyLittleThing X Kelly Gale with Paris Hilton at the Sunset Towers in Los Angeles

Charlotte layered her ensemble with a cropped black jacket, which she styled with a thigh-grazing mini skirt complete with bottom detailing.

She added white accents to her ensemble including a pair of chic white stilettos and a white handbag, which was full of all of her belongings for the night out.

Charlotte swept her blonde tresses up into a chic bun, while leaving some strands loose to frame her pretty features which were covered in soft touches of make-up.

Wow! Meanwhile, Paris also opted for an all black ensemble as she donned a glitzy mini dress which was adorned with sparkling gems all over

Stylish: She styled her outfit with a black leather jacket and a pair of towering high heeled boots, as well as a pair of oversized cat-eye shades

Blonde babe! The billionaire heiress swept her blonde locks back into a sleek high ponytail, while accentuating her striking features with light touches of make-up

Meanwhile, Paris also opted for an all black ensemble as she donned a glitzy mini dress which was adorned with sparkling gems all over.

She styled her outfit with a black leather jacket and a pair of towering high heeled boots, as well as a pair of oversized cat-eye shades.

The billionaire heiress swept her blonde locks back into a sleek high ponytail, while accentuating her striking features with light touches of make-up.

Glitz: Paris accessorised with a pair of sparkling diamond earrings

Sizzling: Erika Costell flashed her abs in a sultry black unbuttoned top with denim jeans

Sexy: Jasmine Sanders stunned in a semi-sheer crop top and tiny mini skirt

Other familiar faces at the event included Pretty Little Thing ambassador Kelly Gale, influencer Erika Costell and Sports Illustrated model Jasmine Sanders.

Meanwhile, it's been a tough time as of late for Paris who has been grieving the loss of her grandfather, who passed away at the age of 91 last month.

She recently stopped by People Now to discuss the passing of Barron, expressing: 'It's been really hard, we were so close.'

Unreal: Kelly Gale worked her angles in a black dress with zip-up detailing

Sizzling: She styled her look with a silver chain necklace and a pair of strappy stilettos

Strike a pose! Kelly posed with her hands on her hips as he worked her angles for the camera

'My entire life I've looked up to him and admired him and he's been my mentor, and he's such a legend,' she continued.

'I'm heartbroken that he's gone, but I have to think about it in a way that he lived such a full life,' Paris shared.

'He created this incredible legacy, and I'm going to continue with his legacy. And now he's in heaven with my grandmother,' she concluded.

Pals: Paris and Jasmine posed up a storm while they sat ready for dinner

Big boss! Pretty Little Thing CEO Umar Kamani caught up with both Jasmine and Paris

Dinner time! Jasmine pouted for the camera as she sat at the dinner table
description: The actress, 26, put her ample assets on display in a tiny black bralet with a plunging neckline, which also highlighted her toned washboard abs.
